content:
I think I'll need to do some more research on gaming networks and routers to make sure I get the right equipment. Do you think I could get away with using my current router, or should I invest in a new one specifically designed for gaming?
Also, I set up my smart thermostat last Saturday, March 17th, and it's been working great so far. I'm loving the energy savings and the ability to control the temperature remotely.
